entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of wet snow mixed with rain ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Snow level rising to 1200 metres this morning. Fog patches early this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Snow level 1200 metres. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 05 February 2023
